column8:
Margaret Thatcher is one of very few politicians worth admiring. In a world of political and fiscal incompetence, we mourn the passing of her kind. Someone more concerned with making hard choices rather than politically expedient ones.

This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong but the love of money for its own sake."
column21: This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong but the love of money for its own sake." A t shirt from a series to be found at weadmire.net.
